data.message:
Thanks a million Facebook, God has allowed your social media to connect us with families, relatives and friends that we have not seen for a very long time. We have also been meeting people, whom we never knew nor saw but are growing to love and cherish them all.
Thanks once again Facebook,
for being Absolutely Awesome!
May God Richly Bless your organization throughout 2015 and Beyond.

replies.message: We appreciate the kind words, Bernard, and we're glad we could help you stay connected. All the best in the new year! -Rose
Thank you, Rose, you are welcome!
What does GOD have to , do with Facebook?  Religion kills.

I Agree with you Bryan, Religion is man made which means, we cannot trust NO MAN, because they can let us down. Believe me, however, we can put our confidence in God, HE never, never let's us down. I pray to GOD for Facebook and everyone that is on FB
so that ALL will go well and GOD'S presence will bring happiness and contentment to US ALL.
Believe me God is everything and in everything. We can't leave Him out.
Bryan, Have yourself a wonderful weekend!
